Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Timoxenos. Perhaps from the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR P.16097.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (270)
